Header: Prime Minister visits Dawatagaha Mosque in Colombo
Content: Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe visited Dawatagaha Jummah Mosque in Colombo today and received the blessings. The Prime Minister visited the Mosque on an invitation from the Deputy Mayor of Colombo Municipal Council, M T M Iqbal. A group of people including members of the Colombo Municipal Council were present on the occasion.
